response.original_title: CAROLINA CUERVO: QUE NADA TIRE A MINHA PAZ
response.overview: Being empathetic or hypocritical? Be optimistic or pessimistic? Be an angel or a devil? Adulthood brings many challenges. The extraordinary Carolina Cuervo, makes us an irreverent and funny analysis of how to deal with the undesirable effects of the 40â€™s crisis. She show us to face all the nerves and insecurities. But of course, without letting anything take our peace away.
response.title: Carolina Cuervo: Nothing Will Take My Peace Away
